posts.post_content:
Corners much sharper than the grade.

Price is $250 delivered within the United States.

Final price reduction to $xx delivered within the U.S. (figured I'd save myself and other sellers the repeated bumps).

PayPal is fine. You don't even need to bring a gift.

Three-day negotiations welcomed and encouraged, especially if we're haggling over a dollar or two. Card will be put on hold until we do or don't reach a deal.

Thanks,  Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com[/URL]
To be fair that card is a 10+++++. Wait, one more:+.
If only you'd ship to the great white north.
Dammit, and here I was willing to pay the full $250.
